revised_title: Novel Synthesis of Heteronuclear Metal Clusters with Rhodium
tldr: The article discusses the synthesis of heteronuclear metal clusters containing rhodium using novel routes based on isolobal relationships between metal ligand fragments and organic species. The authors demonstrate the preparation of various compounds with metal-metal bonds, highlighting the potential of this approach in the synthesis of new metal clusters and the importance of understanding isolobal concepts in inorganic and organic chemistry.
